duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate innovative content for social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, and TikTok, focusing on performance-driven content that sells products effectively.
Keep up to date with current beauty and lifestyle trends on social media and incorporate them into content creation.
Produce a large volume of content at a rapid pace, focusing on creating content that resembles real TikTok videos and is visually engaging.
Create content on a wide variety of topics like food, makeup, clothing, skincare, and other relevant subjects, with the ability to produce clickbait content.
Collaborate with the team of editors to create high-quality, engaging content and be self-sufficient in content production whenever possible.
Demonstrate highly creative visual thinking, prolific generation of ideas, and a demonstrated ability to translate complex topics into visually engaging media.
Be open-minded and dynamic, focused on finding innovative ways to produce engaging content for social media platforms.
Complete an assessment by producing 1-3 video ads for brands the company works with.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
